value.title: Using R Visuals with Power BI
value.excerpt: You can take advantage of the R Script showcase to start using R Visuals with your reports. value.title: Generate Year Month Day Combinations in Power BI Report using Power Query Date ToText Function

value.excerpt: ALLEXCEPT is a handy DAX function to retrieve all the columns of a table except for some. value.title: Describe Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn about the Power BI Desktop model structure, star schema design basics, analytics queries, and report visual configuration. This module provides a strong foundation on which you can learn to optimize model designs and add model calculations.
